item.title: Logan Lednicky caps dream with volleyball title at Texas A&M
item.description: The fourth-generation Aggie helped Texas A&M win its first volleyball title in a most improbable fashion.

item.title: Sources: McNeil traded to A's amid Mets overhaul

item.title: Notre Dame-BYU series puts USC rivalry on pause

item.title: Michigan closing in on No. 1 Arizona in men's poll
item.description: No. 2 Michigan is closing the gap on Arizona, which remains No. 1 on the AP Top 25 men's college basketball poll for the third straight week.
